meanings.definition: To sit down again after getting up.
meanings.sent1: After standing up to stretch, she resat on the comfy couch.
meanings.sent2: He resat in the chair after realizing he forgot his phone.
meanings.sent3: The cat resat on the warm spot on the windowsill, refusing to move.
meanings.sent4: The idea resat in his mind, growing stronger with each passing moment.
meanings.sent5: She resat on the same bench, feeling a sense of deja vu.

meanings.sent1: She resat in the front row after briefly leaving the room.
meanings.sent2: He resat at the dining table to finish his meal.
meanings.sent3: The child resat in the swing, giggling with delight.
meanings.sent4: His words resat in her heart, bringing comfort in difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The audience resat after the intermission, eager for the play to continue.

meanings.definition: To sit down again in a different place.
meanings.sent1: She resat at the desk in the corner, away from the noisy chatter.
meanings.sent2: He resat by the window to enjoy the view of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The group resat at a new table, hoping for better service.
meanings.sent4: The feeling of peace resat in her soul as she found a new spot to rest.
meanings.sent5: The traveler resat at a different cafe, savoring the local delicacies.
